Package org.apache.wayang.core.platform

Interface ChannelInstance

All Superinterfaces:
ExecutionResource, ReferenceCountable
All Known Subinterfaces:
JavaChannelInstance
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractChannelInstance, BroadcastChannel.Instance, CollectionChannel.Instance, DataSetChannel.Instance, FileChannel.Instance, RddChannel.Instance, SqlQueryChannel.Instance, StreamChannel.Instance, TensorChannel.Instance
public interface ChannelInstance extends ExecutionResource
Represents the actual, allocated resource represented by Channel.

  • Method Details

    • getChannel

      Channel getChannel()
      Returns:
      the Channel that is implemented by this instance

    • getMeasuredCardinality

      OptionalLong getMeasuredCardinality()
      Optionally provides the measured cardinality of this instance. However, such a cardinality might not be available for several reasons. For instance, the measurement might not have been requested or could not be implemented by the executing Platform.
      Returns:
      the measured cardinality if available

    • setMeasuredCardinality

      void setMeasuredCardinality(long cardinality)
      Register the measured cardinality with this instance.

    • isMarkedForInstrumentation

      default boolean isMarkedForInstrumentation()
      Tells whether this instance should be instrumented

    • getLineage

      ChannelLineageNode getLineage()
      Provides a ChannelLineageNode that keeps around (at least) all non-executed predecessor ChannelInstances and OptimizationContext.OperatorContexts.
      Returns:
      the ChannelLineageNode

    • wasProduced

      Tells whether this instance was already produced.
